title: Remove ability to surrender.
body:
It's a pretty ♥♥♥♥ing pointless thing to have in the game when 75% of the people who need it most refuse to use it.

I'm not complaining about games where it's 10 to 30 and the team wants to try make a comeback, no, those teams I can deal with, because the games don't usually go too long.

It's when it's 3 to 63 and both teams make it a really ♥♥♥♥ing painful long game that's not even worth trying to do my best and gets dragged out to over an hour.

That makes me homocidal.

edit: censored bad words

replies.body:
I have had a surrender used against me once in a Promo Match...
They just all decided to not let me get promoted... by surrendering.
They should remove it from Ranked.

Because %%%% that.

One situation when I vote "no" in surrenders is when team mates are being toxic. If you're going to rage, blame someone and in general be a %%%%, well, guess what? I'm going to drag that game out as long as possible to make the experience as awful for you as you made it for me.

Even if I'm not the one being raged at, seeing someone else get raged at is just depressing. It amuses me to no end when the rager starts crying "who the %%%% voted no, why won't we surrender, omg."

So if you want people to surrender, be a lot more polite if possible.
